attributes.action: Deport anyone that encourages and preaches terrorism and hate in Great Britain
attributes.additional_details: We all want the government to take control and combat terrorism and hate in our country.  We need to fight this before it gets worse, and it will if nothing is done.  No matter our colour, race or religion, we all need to stand as one and fight the people who threaten us.  If a person says they hate our country and our people and they want us all dead they should have no right to live here.
